Title: Dark'nd
Description: Dark'nd is a fast-paced, 3rd person, Sci-Fi Action arcade game for the XBOX 360, that pits up to 4 players against each other or against AI-Controlled enemies. Players can choose from 4 unique races: Human, Alotech, Drunj, or Traiwynd. Each race has a different starship and many unique weapons. Starships get disabled by E.M.P. blasts, get sucked into oblivion by wormholes, or crash headlong into planets and asteroids. Fight to the death in Last-Man-Standing Game or wage an all-out war in Free-For-All Mode. Team up with your friends and battle an onslaught of AI-Controlled starships with varying difficulty levels. Use devastating weapons such as: Star Pulverizer Cannon, Illusion Projector, Photon Turrets, or even the mighty Wormhole Generator.

Dark'nd XBOX 360 - Demo


Dark'nd is a fast-paced, 3rd person, Sci-Fi Action arcade game for the XBOX 360, that pits up to 4 players against each other or against AI-Controlled enemies. Players can choose from 4 unique races: Human, Alotech, Drunj, or Traiwynd. Each race has a different starship and many unique weapons. Starships get disabled by E.M.P. blasts, get sucked into oblivion by wormholes, or crash headlong into planets and asteroids. Fight to the death in Last-Man-Standing Game or wage an all-out war in Free-For-All Mode. Team up with your friends and battle an onslaught of AI-Controlled starships with varying difficulty levels. Use devastating weapons such as: Star Pulverizer Cannon, Illusion Projector, Photon Turrets, or even the mighty Wormhole Generator.


NOTE

"YOU MUST HAVE AN XBOX 360 AND A SUBSCRIPTION TO XNA GAME CREATOR'S CLUB TO PLAY THIS DEMO!"
